mapper.insert: INSERT INTO springbootmanager.comment(email, name, `describe`, content, date, parentId, articleId) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{describe}, #{content}, #{date}, #{parentId}, #{articleId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, name, `describe`, content, date, parentId, articleId from springbootmanager.comment WHERE articleId = #{articleId} and parentId = -1 order by date desc;
SELECT id, email, name, `describe`, content, date, parentId, articleId from springbootmanager.comment WHERE parentId = #{commentId} order by date desc;
